title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

name.title: The name of OCF manifest.
name.description: The name of OCF manifest that uniquely identifies this object within the entity sub-tree. Must be a non-empty string. We recommend using a CLI-friendly name.

prefix.$comment: TODO: How to restrict prefix to be set only by controller?
prefix.title: The prefix value is automatically set when storing manifest in OCH.
prefix.description: The prefix value is automatically computed and set when storing manifest in OCH.

spec.title: The spec schema
spec.description: A container for the TypeInstance specification definition.

typeRef.title: The createdFromRef schema
typeRef.description: The full path to the Type form which this instance was created.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: Holds the configuration constraints for the given Type. It needs to be valid against the Type JSONSchema.
